ComicInfo.Summary: Atlantic City, New Jersey Three Months Later.: Three months have passed and Ed still isn't at the end of the trail, then hits a dead end. He passes out in a bar, has some dreams that seem to be about being tagged, and wakes up to a stranger talking to him. The stranger appears to be Cain (he says he was never tagged but he has tagged someone) and he has been helping Ed figure out the trail. He tells Ed that many people have tried to end the curse (including himself) without success. Finally Cain mentions that even children are tagged and tag others. He then gives Ed the name and address of the latest person who has been tagged.
ComicInfo.Title: Atlantic City, New Jersey Three Months Later.
